thread.title: 16 Adult References In "The Powerpuff Girls" That Flew Right Over Your Head As A Kid
thread.title_full: 16 Adult References In "The Powerpuff Girls" That Flew Right Over Your Head As A Kid

author: Christopher Hudspeth
title: 16 Adult References In "The Powerpuff Girls" That Flew Right Over Your Head As A Kid
text:
View this image › 
Cartoon Network ID: 10622794 2. When Buttercup slipped condoms in the Professor’s jacket pocket as the girls helped get him ready for his date. View this image › 
ID: 10621410 3. That time Sedusa pretended to be Sara Bellum and flirted with the Mayor by sharpening his pencil and it looked like this: View this image › 
Cartoon Network ID: 10621935 4. When the Mayor decided he wanted to have a conjugal visit with Sedusa. View this image › 
Cartoon Network ID: 10622278 5. When Sara Bellum suggested the girls use their aesthetic assets to defeat the Rowdyruff Boys. View this image › 
ID: 10615906 6. The time Blossom crammed stuffed animals in her shirt to imitate Sara Bellum. View this image › 
Cartoon Network ID: 10615794 7. The time they showed Sara Bellum’s address and it was 69 Yodelena Valley. As in “ yodel in the valley .” View this image › 
Cartoon Network ID: 10620750 8. When you found out the Professor’s old college friend’s name is Dick Hardly. View this image › 
Cartoon Network ID: 10621199 9. When Dick Hardly created a bunch of Powerpuff Girl replicas and one customer used his as a sex doll. View this image › 
Cartoon Network ID: 10621091 10. That time Roach Coach fell off a building and his twitching robot hand flipped off the Powerpuff Girls. View this image › 
Cartoon Network ID: 10623039 11. That time the Powerpuff Girls’ neighbor knew her parents didn’t plan her creation. View this image › 
Cartoon Network ID: 10622344 12. The time the Professor almost hooked up with Fuzzy Lumpkins. View this image › 
Cartoon Network ID: 10622508 13. When Fuzzy Lumpkins got busy with the pile of mud that was attached to the Professor. View this image › 
Cartoon Network ID: 10622615 14. When the Power Puff Girls promo commercial had a body development joke. View this image › 
Cartoon Network ID: 10623199 15. This drawing of some kid’s angry, alcoholic father holding a bottle of booze in the classroom. View this image › 
Cartoon Network ID: 10623344 16. And finally, without context, the time Buttercup said this sentence: View this image ›
